title: OMOP Clinical Data Infrastructure
content: Core OMOP CDM standardization and EHR integration platform. Seamlessly transform data from Epic and Cerner into OMOP format. Enables interoperable AI deployment, eliminates vendor lock-in, and accelerates multi-institutional research collaboration.

title: Secure AI Sandboxing & Datathons
content: Safe research enclaves for clinical AI experimentation. HIPAA compliant sandboxes with MCP support and Claude Code integration (Beta). Successfully powers datathons with 100+ researchers. Host multi-institutional datathons and enable collaborative AI research.

title: Enterprise Integration & Security
content: Comprehensive Epic and Cerner connectivity. HL7 FHIR, proprietary APIs, and complete audit logging. Multi-cloud deployment on Azure and GCP with HIPAA compliance.

title: AI Agent Infrastructure (Coming Soon)
content: Future roadmap: Enterprise-grade infrastructure for intelligent healthcare agents. Planned capabilities include multi-model orchestration and agent-to-agent communication. Built for clinical decision support and next-generation AI applications.
